categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Eisek was a male Human officer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he was the Captain of the Harrower-class dreadnought Doombringer, which was used by Moff Valion Pyron to install and test the Silencer superlaser. Before the testing, he received a message from Captain Joris of Darth Achelon's flagship Carnage, who requested aid.
Captain Eisek appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission.
